[[File:Westerlands on-screen map.jpg|thumb|right|Map showing the location of Sarsfield]]
'''Sarsfield''' is a castle in [[the Westerlands]] and the seat of [[House Sarsfield]], a noble house sworn to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. It is located southwest to [[Golden Tooth]] and northeast of Casterly Rock, being connected to the two castles through the [[River Road]], and northeast of [[Hornvale]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Sarsfield is the seat of the eponymous House Sarsfield.
